name: Basketball Legend
description:
Basketball Legend is a simple but extremely addictive sports game! Let's play perfect Passionate Basketball! Shoot for the hoop and score as many points as you can!

Basketball MVP features:
- Nice graphics
- Basketball match music
- Single player mode and multi-player mode
- 5 lives to go with time limits
- Easy to control, fun for every age players
- Challenge your friends to get a high ranking in the leaderboard

How to play:
1. Drag the dotted line to change the power and angle
2. Drag finger left/right to aim the basketball
3. Release finger to throw the basketball to hoop

Enjoy making basketball shots!
